channel.title: CVE Feed for FAKTOR VIER -- F4 Improvements
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FAKTOR VIER -- F4 Improvements

item.title: CVE-2024-31925|2024-08-02T01:59:50.657Z -- faktor%20vier -- f4%20improvements
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in FAKTOR VIER F4 Improvements allows Stored XSS.This issue affects F4 Improvements: from n/a through 1.8.0.
